game_description: Chimp Mania is a game about hanging out with friends! You can do many things like Walking on the moon, Talking to Friends, or even play in the water!!! You can also invite friends to play the game by telling them the code you are in!!! A code is a string of letters you can type in to see people! Or you can walk out of the tree to get in a public server!
review_1: This game is fun and the horror mode is the funnest part about it how fun is this game 5 STARS GOOD.
